name: Stride Racing
description: Stride Racing is a platform that enables fans to purchase elite racehorses. Similar to Angelist, investors can research, buy, manage and watch their portfolios of syndicated thoroughbreds at a fraction of the traditional ownership cost.
one_liner: Stride Racing is a platform that enables fans to purchase elite racehorses. Similar to Angelist, investors can research, buy, manage and watch their portfolios of syndicated thoroughbreds at a fraction of the traditional ownership cost.
